articles.title: ‘City killers’ and half-giraffes: how many scary asteroids really go past Earth every year? - HT Tech
articles.description: Asteroids are certainly good at capturing the public imagination. This follows many Hollywood movies imagining the destruction they could cause if a big one hits Earth.
